name: RunRun (AQiiiii)
description:
You play as an unemployed office worker who spends the last of his money on a cruise. But because of a sudden storm at sea, the ship was washed up on a desert island. Thinking that there would be no job and no money back home, he decided to live on the island. In the end he regained his happiness and confidence while surviving on the island.

This is a third-person survival simulation game. The player's ship is stranded on an island surrounded by the sea. Fortunately, the island is rich in resources, with plenty of plants, animals, and clean water. The player is determined to survive on such a beautiful island. Players can grow vegetables, fish, hunting, build shelters, make tools, and make toys on the desert island to unlock unique island entertainment projects. Players need to keep their body temperature, hunger resin, body moisture, mental state, and other values within a normal range, or they will die. Players will challenge the maximum number of days they can survive. 

Human(player) : 

• Image: Lowpoly people • Move: walk back and forth,

side to side, jump. • Hunger value: If you don't eat

for too long, you'll starve. • Water content: Too long

without water will die of thirst. • Entertainment value: Too long without entertainment will die.

• Physical strength: Need sleep to replenish. 

Wild plant (small red fruit) 

Image: Tree with red fruit Growth cycle: germination - growth - maturity - death. 

Pigs

The pigs were the only animals running around the island Growth cycle: piggy - big piggy - Death"
